title: [K-12] Web-Based Learning Object Evaluation Scale Development Course for Elementary Students

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic digital tools and understanding of foundational social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Project-based learning evaluating/analyzing social studies learning objects using web-based interactive tools in BYOD environments

learning_goals: At least three 5-point Likert scale items measuring learning effectiveness, design quality, and engagement factors of Learning Objects (LOs) can be developed
Content validity of the developed scale achieves over 80% through peer review
Evaluation scales are applied to three web-based social studies Learning Objects, and a result report is generated

resources: Five Types of Learning Object Samples

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
